TopicTitle: Annoying bug!! with save files and missing mods

Articles.Content:
I had this problem,when uninstall some mods and open my save file, the game says "couldn't load vesse....l"i press ok,then i can't go inside any building.i tried to relaunch the game bot still didn't work,i hope it get fixed, i lost a lot of save files.![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

i checked the debug and it says: [exception]: NullReferenceExeption : Object reference not set to an instance of an object

If the craft in question uses assets of deleted mods then it's normal for it to not load. 

Also I'm not sure what you're trying to do with "" but if you're trying to post screenshots you should link them from some service like imgur and not use a local path as it will not work.
If you know what your doing you can remove the offending code from the persistence file. I have certainly done it a few times with no corrupted saves.
